s.text: just sit around hitting the bong, watching CNN, and sending Secret Service guys out to bring back some Taco Bell.
Both CNN and MSNBC are chockablock with political bulletin boards, though they too are tepid.

Alt.politics.election is the most fertile of these bulletin boards, but other heated campaign confabs can be found at alt.politics.republicans, alt.politics.liberal, alt.politics, alt.politics.usa, alt.politics.media, us.politics, alt.current-events.clinton.whitewater, and others.
